SGCCRfC Wiki

Join the SGCCRfC Community

SGCCRfC is a global, open, non-profit community dedicated to promoting scientific computing, cloud technologies, geosciences, numerical modeling, and multidisciplinary research. Anyone interested in science and computing is welcome to join.

üåç Who Can Join?

  • Researchers and scientists
  • Students and educators
  • Cloud and HPC engineers
  • Geoscience professionals
  • Open-source contributors
  • Data scientists, ML/AI engineers
  • Anyone passionate about open scientific knowledge

ü§ù Why Join?

  • Access curated scientific and computing resources
  • Connect with experts in cloud, HPC, and scientific domains
  • Contribute to open knowledge repositories
  • Collaborate on open-source projects
  • Stay updated with community events and training
  • Early access to new SGCCRfC tools and documentation

üì¨ How to Join?

Joining is easy:

1. Follow on GitHub

Stay updated with repositories and documentation

2. Join the Discussions

Share ideas, ask questions, and collaborate
üëâ GitHub Discussions (coming soon)

üëâ Email subscription (planned)

4. Contribute to the Wiki

Add resources, correct information, or create new sections.
